pkgmetadata.longdescription: Recursive Partitioning for Longitudinal Profiles Using Baseline Covariates // Constructs longitudinal tree (i.e., regression tree with heterogeneous longitudinal profile) for continuous longitudinal outcome using baseline covariates as partitioning variables according to the 'LongCART' algorithm as described in Kundu and Harezlak (2019) doi:10.1080/24709360.2018.1557797.
